sourcesContent:
import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import { Dialog, Disclosure, Popover, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { RectangleGroupIcon, Bars3Icon, ChartPieIcon, CursorArrowRaysIcon, FingerPrintIcon, LightBulbIcon, XMarkIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' import { ChevronDownIcon, PhoneIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import img1 from '../../pic/pngegg.png' import { useRecoilState } from 'recoil' import { CartAtom } from '../../Atoms/Products-Atom' const productsCate = [ { name: "Men", to: '/', icon: ChartPieIcon }, { name: "Women", to: '/', icon: CursorArrowRaysIcon }, { name: "Jewelery", to: '/', icon: FingerPrintIcon }, { name: "Electronics", to: '/', icon: LightBulbIcon }, { name: 'All', to: '/', icon: RectangleGroupIcon }, ] const callsToAction = [ { name: 'Contact sales', to: '/contact', icon: PhoneIcon }, ] function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function Nav(){ const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false) const [ cart ] = useRecoilState(CartAtom) return (
Home Product
{productsCate.map((item) => (
{item.name}
))}
{callsToAction.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}
Features Contact Us
Cart {cart.length > 0 && cart.length} →
{cart.length > 0 ?
{cart.map((e)=>{ return(

{e.product.title}

${e.product.price}
) })}
:

No Products Yet

}
Your Company
Home Product
{productsCate.map((item) => (
{item.name}
))}
{callsToAction.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}
Features Contact Us
{cart.length > 0 ? Cart {cart.length} :Cart}
) }
